TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because English can't get enough vitamin W.

Why does math have numbers?

Because the mathematicians can't learn 26 letters, it's too many for them.

Why are the Telebubbies so disgusting?

Because some TV producer somewhere has a low opinion of the intelligence of toddlers.

Why are pseudo reality shows so heavily programmed?

Because then they would be reality tv shows, and we can’t have that!

Whats the deal with airline food?

$10 on top of the ticket price.

What is a good Dad joke?

"I'm your father, Luke!"

Why did Princess Leia  not send the Death Star blueprints by e-mail?

They only had 2g and it would have taken ages.

Why didn't the Death Star blow up the intervening planet?

Because gas giants don't explode, only fart.

Why do hotdog packs come in 8, but hotdog bun packs come in 10?

Because bakers don't push the meat into the grinder with fingers and can use decimal numbers, while the butchers can use only octals.

Why call the cow a dog?

Because it would be strange to call the dog a cow.

Why do we travel the world to see what other people built?

Because it's much easier than to build something worthy of another one's travel.

2 hours ago, ColdJ said:

Because it would be strange to call the dog a cow.

Why?.. It's a well-known recipe of cheap shawarma when a lot of street dogs are around because it's a cozy rural market.

***

Why are the crows not ravens?

Because of biology 

How does an r-7 soyuz work?

Pshh!!! Wrrrr!!! Pewwww!!! RRRRRRRR!!! 

Are the beeplanes better than treeplanes?

Not sure, but the beep lanes are noisy and the tree planes are very flat.

If you mushed the asteroid belt together how would it compare size wise to the Moon?

Enough to fill the lunar south polar ocean.

If the ring of asteroids is "belt", and it's kinda the solar system's waist, then from which side of the belt is the butt?

It's BEHIND you!

Are diamonds forever?

Diamonds will turn into diamond-shaped neutron stars.

Are the diamonds girlz' best friends?

Yes they aren’t.

Will someone message me the word tomato?

Tomato

How does reputation go up

You do good deeds, people start respecting you, so your reputation grows.
Or just get moar money. The reputation may fall, but you won't care.

How do they distinguish the first "to" and the last "to" in "tomato"?

They separate them with a mat so that they don't get confused.

Is an Atomato really small or really radioactive?

Radioactive

How do you get a car to work on Mars

Replace the gas engine with steam engine and use Mars bars as fuel.

How could the Watt's Steam Engine work without internet conection?

By replacing the nets with leather drive belts.

Why does KSP have a space speed limit?

Because otherwise they should upload all resources of the Universe on the program start.

Why Kerbin is not cubic?
